name: Relentless (TyNorman)
description:
Survive as long as you can through waves of enemies, using earned money to purchase upgrades to improve your chances of survival.

This project was developed solo during the 72 hour Indies Vs Gamers jam. Minor updates have been made since to improve pixel-perfect rendering and fix some minor bugs.

Controls

W/A/S/D - Move Up, Left, Down, and Right

Left Click - Shoot, place purchased turret

E - Access shop vendor

Esc - Exit
